mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `user_collection` WHERE user_id = #{user_client_id} AND article_id = #{article_id}

SELECT wpp.ID AS aid, wpp.post_date AS DATE, wpp.post_title AS title, (SELECT guid FROM wp_posts WHERE id = wppm.meta_value) AS img, wpu.ID AS author_id, wpu.display_name AS author FROM wp_posts wpp LEFT JOIN wp_users wpu ON wpp.post_author = wpu.ID LEFT JOIN wp_postmeta wppm ON wpp.ID = wppm.post_id LEFT JOIN `user_collection` uc ON wpp.id = uc.`article_id` WHERE wpp.post_status = 'publish' AND wpp.post_type = 'post' AND wppm.meta_key = '_thumbnail_id' AND uc.`user_id`=#{user_client_id} ORDER BY uc.`time` DESC
LIMIT #{pageNum},#{showNum}
